scripts.imdb:dbcontext: dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold 'Data Source=./movie.sqlite' Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite -o ImdbContext -n Contexts --context-namespace Contexts -f
scripts.imdb:controller:title: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name TitleController -dc Contexts.MovieContext -m Contexts.Title -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.imdb:controller:rating: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name RatingController -dc Contexts.MovieContext -m Contexts.Rating -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.imdb:controller:person: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name PersonController -dc Contexts.MovieContext -m Contexts.Person -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.imdb:controller:episode: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name EpisodeController -dc Contexts.MovieContext -m Contexts.Episode -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.imdb:controller:crew: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name CrewController -dc Contexts.MovieContext -m Contexts.Crew -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.imdb:controller:aka: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name AkaController -dc Contexts.MovieContext -m Contexts.Aka -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.imdb:controller: npm-run-all -p imdb:controller:title imdb:controller:rating imdb:controller:person imdb:controller:episode imdb:controller:crew imdb:controller:aka
scripts.update-controller: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator controller -name MyDatabaseController -dc vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTableContext -m vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTable -async -api -outDir Controllers -sqlite -f
scripts.update-page: dotnet aspnet-codegenerator razorpage -m vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTable -dc vue_dotnet.MyDbContext.MyTableContext -udl -outDir Pages/MyDatabase --referenceScriptLibraries -sqlite
